sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import views from "../../assets/Images/Icons/views.svg" import likes from "../../assets/Images/Icons/likes.svg" import videoDetails from '../../data/video-details.json' const Main = (props) => { const mainContentId = props.mainDisplayId const mainContent = videoDetails.find(video => video.id === mainContentId) return(

{mainContent.title}

{mainContent.channel}

{new Date(mainContent.timestamp).toLocaleDateString()}

{mainContent.views}

{mainContent.likes}

{mainContent.description}

) } export default Main;
